name: Lo-fi-7
description:
Lo-fi-7 is a relaxing musical puzzle game. The game generates 14 deterministic random chords with certain constraints and mechanism based on "7". Scoring system is not meant for competitive purpose but a motivation for better music and abuse prevention.

Both mouse and keyboard controls are supported.
For keyboard user,

  • UP/DOWN - Navigate
  • ENTER/SPACE - Select
  • ESCAPE - Back Button
  • Q/W/E/R/T/Y/U/A/S/D/F/G/H/J - 14 Chord Buttons

Press buttons. Enjoy the music. Within 77 seconds.
